Staten IslandHomeContact UsServicesAbout Face Boutique TMJ Education Testimonials Book a Consultation MoreHomeContact UsServicesAbout Face Boutique TMJ Education Testimonials Book a Consultation <!--googleoff: all-->Sign InCreate AccountMy AccountSigned in as:filler@godaddy.comMy AccountSign out<!--googleon: all-->Signed in as:filler@godaddy.comHomeContact UsServicesAbout Face Boutique TMJ Education Testimonials Book a Consultation AccountMy AccountSign outSign InMy AccountGet TMJ relief todayGet TMJ relief todayGet TMJ relief todayGet TMJ relief todayMost of our patience experience immediate TMJ pain relief from Dr. Greg Pedro's arsenal of treatment options.Call 718-356-9700Schedule a Consultation   Why Choose the TMJ Jaw Pain CenterProviding the Latest and Most Effective TMJ Treatments If you’re experiencing TMJ pain, you owe it to yourself to see Dr. Greg Pedro at the TMJ Jaw Pain Center of Staten Island@About Face Dental Medi-Spa. He's a highly experienced dentist extensively trained in the anatomy of the jaw and diagnosing dysfunction in your bite. TMJ pain is a highly complex condition that manifests in a number ofShow More If you’re experiencing TMJ pain, you owe it to yourself to see Dr. Greg Pedro at the TMJ Jaw Pain Center of Staten Island@About Face Dental Medi-Spa. He's a highly experienced dentist extensively trained in the anatomy of the jaw and diagnosing dysfunction in your bite. TMJ pain is a highly complex condition that manifests in a number of symptoms with even more potential causes.  A skilled clinician such as Dr. Pedro helps determine the underlying cause of your particular joint disorder and evaluates your individual condition.  You may have other symptoms caused by the misalignment of your jaw you don't even realize are related to your TMJ.Show LessMeet Dr. Pedro Dr. Gregory Pedro, DMD, the Staten Island TMJ Specialist Who Wrote the Book on TMJ SyndromeDr. Pedro has over 30 years of experience treating a wide range of dental issues. As a prosthodontist, Dr. Pedro is sought after for many services beyond his TMJ/TMD expertise.  Think Implants, Crowns and Bridges, Veneers, Tooth Whitening, Tooth Jewels and More. TMJ Syndrome / TMDTMJ Syndrome / TMD  Few dentists take the extensive additional coursework and make the significant technological investment to accurately diagnose and effectively treat TMJ pain.  Most providers use a one-size-fits-all approach, giving all patients bruxism appliances and sending them on their way. While this may work for some patients, it doesn’t provide eShow More  Few dentists take the extensive additional coursework and make the significant technological investment to accurately diagnose and effectively treat TMJ pain.  Most providers use a one-size-fits-all approach, giving all patients bruxism appliances and sending them on their way. While this may work for some patients, it doesn’t provide enough or long-term relief for others.  The wrong appliance can actually cause MORE damage to the already problematic joint.  Many patients come to see Dr. Pedro at the Jaw Pain Center after failed attempts elsewhere.  Show Less   Dr. Greg Pedro, Staten Island's TMJ SpecialistState-of-the-Art TechnologyAt the TMJ Jaw Pain Center of Staten Island@About Face Dental Medi-Spa, we invest in the latest, most effective technologies. Our goal is to always stay current with the efficacy of the most up-to-date treatments so you leave with the most accurate diagnosis and the most effective treatments currently available. Beyond Botox, which has become the "Go-To" TMD Treatment service, we offer digital x-rays, laser dentistry, electrophoresis delivered customized serums, acoustic shockwave therapies, and more.  We are confident no other TMJ provider offers the extensive tools we do with the expertise to give you the best possible care.Explore Our TechnologyExpert TMJ ProviderRead our five-star reviews to see why Dr. Pedro is the right choice for your dental care. He is dedicated to ensuring your visit is a comfortable and positive experience. From the moment you step into our office, you'll be welcomed with a warm smile and treated with the highest level of care and respect. If you suffer from dental phobia, Dr. Pedro’s gentle and compassionate approach makes all the difference. His expertise and commitment to patient comfort set him apart as a truly exceptional dentist! Read some of our Five-Star ReviewsConvenient and Flexible SchedulingWe understand that your time is valuable, which is why we offer flexible scheduling options to accommodate your busy lifestyle. We are here to make dental care convenient for you.  Call today.  Dr. Pedro will add you to his schedule to get you out of pain.  Book a Consultation Affordable Dental CareAt the TMJ Jaw Pain Center of Staten Island, we believe that everyone deserves access to high-quality dental care regardless of their insurance or financial ability. That's why we offer a variety of payment options to ensure you can afford the treatments you need. We also offer financing options to help make dental care more affordable for you and your family.Patient Education and PreventionDr. Pedro believes that education and prevention are the keys to maintaining good oral health. That's why he takes the time to educate his patients on proper oral hygiene and preventive care to help you avoid worsening your condition.     Dr. Greg Pedro's TMD Book is Published!Download our TMJ eBook to better understand your condition. In easy-to-read, clear language, Dr. Pedro addresses: 
        what's involved with diagnosing a TMJ disorder
        short term solutions available to you 
        long term solutions
        cutting edge technological approaches to treating  TMJ

...in a day!Precise, Pain-free Dental Implants
...in a day!Dr. Greg Pedro is Staten's Island's first prosthodontist certified by Neocis, founders of the Yomi Robotic Implant SystemBook Your Consultation Now 718-356-9700   Yomi's Robotically Assisted Dental Implant SystemFirst and Only on Staten IslandDr. Pedro is recognized as Staten Island’s first practitioner to complete the extensive and comprehensive certification training in the Yomi Robotic Dental System, a groundbreaking advancement in dental implant technology. Likewise,  Yomi is the first and only FDA-cleared and approved  robotic system for dental surgery, offering exacting precision for drasticallyimproved outcomes for patients undergoing implant procedures.This cutting-edge technology allows for an incredibly efficient, accurate, and minimally invasive experience for our patients. The system guides Dr. Pedro's placement of dental implants with robotic precision, reducing the need for incisions, often eliminating and always minimizing the need for sutures. This results in a much improved patient experience with far less discomfort, a much faster recovery time, and better overall results.   State of the Art Robotics Assisted CareIntroducing YomiYomi is the first and only FDA-approved system for dental implant surgeries that assists clinicians in all phases of implant placement.  Yomi contributes to Dr. Pedro's confidence and efficacy in treating his patients.  Dr. Pedro uses Yomi to effectively plan patients' visits ensuring ideal results after surgery.Less Time. Less Pain. Exact Placement.Yomi increases Dr. Pedro's precision and efficiency to painlessly place your dental implants. Procedures that take several months elsewhere are completed at the Robotic Implant Center in a day. Our patients' pain us drastically reduced.  The healing process is vastly accelerated.    Treatment Options/ServicesFull Mouth/Full Arch ReconstructionFull Mouth/Full Arch Reconstruction with dental implants is a comprehensive treatment aimed at restoring both the functionality and aesthetics of a patient's entire mouth. Full Mouth Reconstruction offers a holistic approach to rebuilding the smile.  Implant Overdentures – Fully RemovableImplant overdentures offer a stable and comfortable solution for patients who have lost most or all of their teeth. This innovative treatment involves securing a removable denture onto dental implants that are strategically placed in the jawbone. Unlike traditional dentures, implant overdentures provide greater stability and retention, minimizing issues such as slipping or discomfort while eating or speaking.  Fixed-Removable Implant DenturesFixed-removable implant dentures offer patients a secure and permanent solution for missing teeth, combining the stability of dental implants with the convenience of a removable denture. This advanced treatment involves attaching a custom denture to dental implants that are anchored securely in the jawbone. The result is a restoration that looks, feels, and functions like natural teeth, providing patients with renewed confidence and comfort in their smiles.      Crestal Approach Sinus Lift (Minimally Invasive)The crestal approach sinus lift is a minimally invasive technique used to augment the sinus floor and create space for dental implants in the posterior maxilla. Unlike traditional sinus lift procedures, which require a larger incision and more extensive bone grafting, the crestal approach involves accessing the sinus through the implant site, minimizing trauma to surrounding tissues and reducing recovery time. In-House CBCT Scan TechnologyIn-house CBCT scan planning represents our commitment to investing in advanced technologies to enhance the precision and efficiency of dental implant treatment. Cone beam computed tomography (CBCT) imaging provides detailed 3D images of the oral and maxillofacial structures, allowing for comprehensive assessment and the precise planning of implant placement.Learn more    Single Tooth Dental ImplantsSingle tooth dental implants offer a permanent solution for replacing individual missing teeth, restoring both function and aesthetics to the smile. This procedure involves the surgical placement of a dental implant into the jawbone, providing a sturdy foundation for a custom-designed prosthetic tooth. Zirconia Restored Dental ImplantsZirconia restored dental implants represent the pinnacle of implant dentistry, offering superior strength, durability, and aesthetics. Made from high-quality zirconia material, these implants provide a metal-free alternative that is biocompatible and highly resistant to corrosion.Computer-Guided Implant SurgeryComputer-guided implant surgery utilizes advanced technology to enhance the precision and accuracy of dental implant placement. This innovative approach involves the use of 3D imaging and computer software to create a detailed virtual model of the patient's mouth, allowing for precise planning and execution of the implant procedure.   Our TeamExpertise You Can Count OnExpertise You Can Count OnBorn and raised on Staten Island, Dr. Greg Pedro is what some consider a local hero. Inducted into the Staten Island Hall of Fame, Dr. Pedro returned to "The Rock" to give back to the community that means the world to him.

A 1983 graduate from the award-winning St. Peter's Boy's Basketball team, Dr. Pedro earned full-scholarships to both Michigan State and Fordham University for his undergraduate Bachelor of Science degree in General Science. He graduated from Temple University's School of Dentistry with his DMD and an ADA certification in the highly specialized and deeply competitive field of Prosthodontics. 

Dr. Pedro continued his quest for excellence and expertise by completing the rigorous Yomi certification process to become an expert at robotically assisted implant surgeries.  He is the only dentist on all of Staten Island who invested in this forward-thinking system so patients have the best possible experience. As the first dental medi-spa owner on Staten Island, Dr. Pedro is changing how Implants are done. The Yomi is a complete game-changer.  Call now for a complimentary consultation.Additionally, Dr. Pedro  invested in the country's premiere TMJ training known as BOTOX FOR DENTISTS where he earned the highly coveted title of TMJ Specialist. Patients credit him for pain-free injections. His chair-side manor is warm and welcoming.  Even the most fearful patients realize tremendous success with their treatment plans set by Dr. Pedro. 

As the first dental medi-spa owner on Staten Island, Dr. Pedro is changing how dentistry, especially Implants, are done. The Yomi is a complete game-changer.  Call now for a complimentary consultation.Schedule a Consultation Expertise You Can Count OnExpertise You Can Count OnExpertise You Can Count OnDr. Greg Pedro is the surgeon you want placing your implants.  With multiple financial support offerings, his office is now open for your complimentary consultation.Call us to learn more   Questions? testimonials.text:
Previous
                          
                            
                              
                             
                                   

                                

                                    
                                                                            
                                            

                                                                                            
                                                                                    
                                    



Truly the best dental experience I’ve ever had. The office was Immaculate and the customer attention was impeccable. Dr. Pedro is very patient, knowledgeable, honest, informative and definitely cares about his patients. I highly recommend this dental office with no hesitation. Awesome experience!




  
                                  

                                                                                                             

                                                                      
                                                                       
                                                                                                                        
                                                                                                   
                                            
                                          
                                        
                                            

                                                  

                                                                         
                                                    Helen Mayers
                                                                                                
                                                
                                            
                                       
                                    
                                                       
                             
                                   

                                

                                    
                                                                            
                                            

                                                                                            
                                                                                    
                                    


I had my first appointment at this office today. The office itself is beautiful and immaculate. My experience with each staff member was excellent. Everyone from the staff at the front desk, dental assistant, and dentist were all incredibly kind and professional. I had a gentle and thorough cleaning. There was no wait time. I highly recommend this office.



  
                                  

                                                                                                             

                                                                      
                                                                       
                                                                                                                        
                                                                                                   
                                            
                                          
                                        
                                            

                                                  

                                                                         
                                                    Myr Go
                                                                                                
                                                
                                            
                                       
                                    
                                                       
                             
                                   

                                

                                    
                                                                            
                                            

                                                                                            
                                                                                    
                                    



Dr Pedro, displays an easygoing attitude, attentively listens to your problems and offers solutions in easy to understand language all while maintaining a professional attitude. Marie at the desk shows the same qualities. Both exude warmth, understanding, and professionalism. I am very happy to have been introduced to Dr. Pedro and his practice. I highly recommend About Face Dental & Aesthetic Boutique.




  
                                  

                                                                                                             

                                                                      
                                                                       
                                                                                                                        
                                                                                                   
                                            
                                          
                                        
                                            

                                                  

                                                                         
                                                    Gloria Archimandritis
                                                                                                
                                                
                                            
                                       
                                    
                                                       
                             
                                   

                                

                                    
                                                                            
                                            

                                                                                            
                                                                                    
                                    



Dr.Pedro did an extraction of my tooth followed by a dental bone graft. He explained me the process of getting a dental implant The procedures were painless.I had no problem with the healing process.I highly recommend Dr.Pedro.He is an excellent doctor, great manners and very friendly. The office is beautiful and the staff is very welcoming.




  
                                  

                                                                                                             

                                                                      
                                                                       
                                                                                                                        
                                                                                                   
                                            
                                          
                                        
                                            

                                                  

                                                                         
                                                    Katarina Malikova
                                                                                                
                                                
                                            
                                       
                                    
                                                       
                             
                                   

                                

                                    
                                                                            
                                            

                                                                                            
                                                                                    
                                    



Me and my fiancé went to Dr Pedro , it was late in the day but he saw the 2 of us. He was so thoughtful and took his time to explain everything- I had a great experience and highly recommend Dr Pedro




  
                                  

                                                                                                             

                                                                      
                                                                       
                                                                                                                        
                                                                                                   
                                            
                                          
                                        
                                            

                                                  

                                                                         
                                                    Richard Dominianni
                                                                                                
                                                
                                            
                                       
                                    
                                                       
                             
                                   

                                

                                    
                                                                            
                                            

                                                                                            
                                                                                    
                                    



A dental specialist that is a combination of: professionalism, detail oriented, honest & caring is a rare find these days! Dr. G. Pedro placed 4 implants for me well over 15 years ago. I moved out of town & subsequently had 2 more implants placed by another prosthodontist. One of the 2 recent implants failed. I came back to Dr. Pedro to save the day by rectifying the situation. The original titanium implants of 15 years have not given me any problems. Do not give a second thought of having anyone else other than Dr. Pedro placing implants into your mouth- you’ll be smiling again & be extremely satisfied with his level of expertise!




  
                                  

                                                                                                             

                                                                      
                                                                       
                                                                                                                        
                                                                                                   
                                            
                                          
                                        
                                            

                                                  

                                                                         
                                                    Christine Felton
                                                                                                
                                                
                                            
                                       
                                    
                                                       
                             
                                   

                                

                                    
                                                                            
                                            

                                                                                            
                                                                                    
                                    



Dr. Pedro was very informative, compassionate, and empathetic. He listened to our goals, made us feel comfortable. The finished result was amazing and over our expectations. I can write this review with a great big smile. I would highly recommend anyone who wishes to have their smile, and your confidence restored, Dr Pedro should be your first and only choice.




  
                                  

                                                                                                             

                                                                      
                                                                       
                                                                                                                        
                                                                                                   
                                            
                                          
                                        
                                            

                                                  

                                                                         
                                                    Eddie Cordero
                                                                                                
                                                
                                            
                                       
                                    
                                                       
                             
                                   

                                

                                    
                                                                            
                                            

                                                                                            
                                                                                    
                                    



Dr. Pedro is an outstanding dentist. I have a very difficult bite and needed a new bridge. Other dentists did not want to try– with time and expertise, Dr. Pedro succeeded in creating a perfect bridge! He has successfully branched into the field of aesthetics. I tried the deep moisturizing machine and received myriad compliments after the first treatment! I have also tried the Opus plasma treatment and my skin feels wonderful!! These are a couple of many fabulous, non-invasive treatments which Dr. Pedro offers in his Dental office. How glamorous to these treatments offered while having dental work!! It’s heaven!!!




  
                                  

                                                                                                             

                                                                      
                                                                       
                                                                                                                        
                                                                                                   
                                            
                                          
                                        
                                            

                                                  

                                                                         
                                                    Katherine Contino
                                                                                                                                                    Web Developer

I can write this review with a great big smile. I would highly recommend anyone who wishes to have their smile, and your confidence restored, Dr Pedro should be your first and only choice.

testimonials.text: Dr. Pedro is an outstanding dentist. I have a very difficult bite and needed a new bridge. Other dentists did not want to try– with time and expertise, Dr. Pedro succeeded in creating a perfect bridge! He has successfully branched into the field of aesthetics. I tried the deep moisturizing machine and received myriad compliments after the first treatment! I have also tried the Opus plasma treatment and my skin feels wonderful!! These are a couple of many fabulous, non-invasive treatments which Dr. Pedro offers in his Dental office. How glamorous to these treatments offered while having dental work!! It’s heaven!!!

I came back to Dr. Pedro to save the day by rectifying the situation. The original titanium implants of 15 years have not given me any problems. Do not give a second thought of having anyone else other than Dr. Pedro placing implants into your mouth- you’ll be smiling again & be extremely satisfied with his level of expertise!

	function setCookie(cname, cvalue, exdays) {
			var d = new Date();
			d.setTime(d.getTime() + (exdays*24*60*60*1000));
			var expires = "expires="+ d.toUTCString();
			document.cookie = cname + "=" + cvalue + ";" + expires + ";path=/";
	}
	
	function getCookie(cname) {
		var name = cname + "=";
		var decodedCookie = decodeURIComponent(document.cookie);
		var ca = decodedCookie.split(';');
		for(var i = 0; i < ca.length; i++) {
			var c = ca[i];
			while (c.charAt(0) == ' ') {
				c = c.substring(1);
			}
			if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
				return c.substring(name.length, c.length);
			}
		}
		return "";
	}

				const lazyloadRunObserver = () => {
					const lazyloadBackgrounds = document.querySelectorAll( `.e-con.e-parent:not(.e-lazyloaded)` );
					const lazyloadBackgroundObserver = new IntersectionObserver( ( entries ) => {
						entries.forEach( ( entry ) => {
							if ( entry.isIntersecting ) {
								let lazyloadBackground = entry.target;
								if( lazyloadBackground ) {
									lazyloadBackground.classList.add( 'e-lazyloaded' );
								}
								lazyloadBackgroundObserver.unobserve( entry.target );
							}
						});
					}, { rootMargin: '200px 0px 200px 0px' } );
					lazyloadBackgrounds.forEach( ( lazyloadBackground ) => {
						lazyloadBackgroundObserver.observe( lazyloadBackground );
					} );
				};
				const events = [
					'DOMContentLoaded',
					'elementor/lazyload/observe',
				];
				events.forEach( ( event ) => {
					document.addEventListener( event, lazyloadRunObserver );
				} );
